message.name: ERR_ACTIVITYRECURRENCE_END_DATE_TIME
message.locale: The activity recurrence end date cannot be before the start date.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITYRECURRENCE_OCCURRENCES_DATES
message.locale: Either recurrence end date or number of occurrences must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITYRECURRENCE_XFV_OCCURRENCES_NUMBER_DATES
message.locale: Either recurrence end date or number of occurrences must be entered, but not both.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITYRECURRENCE_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Activity recurrence start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_EFT_TRUE
message.locale: You have selected EFT as method of payment and not completed bank account details.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_SORTCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Sort Code field must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_BANKBRANCH_EMPTY
message.locale: Bank Branch Name field must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_RECORDFOUND
message.locale: An account exists in this branch with this account number.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_RNFE_SORTCODE
message.locale: The sort code "%1s" does not exist.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_RNFE_BIC
message.locale: The BIC "%1s" does not exist.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_ORGIBANEXISTS_ALREADY
message.locale: A bank account already exists for this organization with this IBAN at the selected bank.
A bank account already exists for this organisation with this IBAN at the selected bank.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_ORGACCEXISTS_ALREADY
message.locale: A bank account already exists for this organization with this account number at the selected bank.
A bank account already exists for this organisation with this account number at the selected bank.

message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_FV_RATE_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid Currency Exchange Rate value "%1s" for Currency type "%2s".

message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_RNFE_DATE_TYPE
message.locale: A currency exchange record for date "%1d" and type "%2s" cannot be found.

message.name: ERR_ESTIMATEDCOST_FV_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The fixed cost cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_GENERALCALENDAR_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The start date and end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERALCALENDAR_FROMTODATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The from date and to date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERALCALENDAR_FV_NONWORKDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The non working date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERALCALENDAR_FV_NONWORKDAYTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The NonWorkingDayType must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERALCALENDAR_FV_REASON_SHORT
message.locale: The reason field must be entered containing at least three characters.

message.name: ERR_GENERALCALENDAR_XRV_RECORDSFOUND
message.locale: There are existing records already in this date range.

message.name: ERR_GENERALCALENDAR_TOO_MANY_RECORDS
message.locale: Your search returned too many records. Please narrow your date range.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Location name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_INVALID_START_DATE_FROM
message.locale: Start date from should not be later than start date to.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_CANCELLED_RECORDS
message.locale: The bank branch selected for this bank account is canceled. Please choose another bank branch.
The bank branch selected for this bank account is cancelled. Please choose another bank branch.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_ACTIVE_RECORDS
message.locale: Duplicate branches with the same sort code found. Please contact the system administrator.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_ACTIVE_BIC_RECORDS
message.locale: Duplicate branches with the same BIC found. Please contact the system administrator.

message.name: INF_PLAYER_STARTUP_FILE
message.locale: Player.crm

message.name: ERR_NUMBER_OF_OCCURRENCES_FV_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The number of occurrences cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Account Name field must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Account Type field must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_NUM_EMPTY
message.locale: Account Number field must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CS_APPLY_FAILURE_DEPENDENT_BO
message.locale: The change set cannot be applied as '%1s' dependent business object(s) have not been added to the change set.
